#summary install JAP_LOCAL_WS_PYTHON

=JAP_LOCAL_WS_PYTHON=

==PRE-INSTALLATION==
  * install PYTHON >= 2.7.0
  * install TWISTED
  * install PYOPENSSL
  * install AUTOBAHN

==INSTALLATION==
  * unzip JAP_LOCAL_WS_PYTHON-X.X.X.zip
  * open JAP_LOCAL_WS_PYTHON-X.X.X
  * [CONFIGURE_JAP_LOCAL_WS configure JAP_LOCAL_WS.json]
  * execute JAP_LOCAL_WS.bat
  * [CONFIGURE_BROWSER configure BROWSER]

==IMPORTANT==
